title: Troubleshoot Parameters Not Accessible by Name
introduction: Some parameters cannot be observed or tuned in the real-time application.

chunks.heading: What This Issue Means
chunks.content:
Reasons that you cannot observe or tune some parameters in the real-time application are:

SimulinkÂ® Real-Timeâ¢ does not support parameters of multiword data types.During execution, you cannot tune parameters that change the model structure, for example, by adding a port. To change these parameters, you must stop the execution, change the parameter, and rebuild the real-time application.

chunks.heading: Try This Workaround
chunks.content: Check the parameters for the issues described in What This Issue Means.
